mapper.insert: insert into reply (replyno, feedno, replycontent, replydate, userid) values (seq_replyno.nextval, #{feedNo}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT usr.* , usr.userid isMyReply FROM (SELECT r.replyno, r.feedno, r.replyContent, r.replyDate, u.userid, u.userNick FROM reply r, userInfo u WHERE r.userid = u.userid(+) and r.feedno = #{feedNo}) usr order by usr.replyno desc
select count(*) from feed f left outer join reply r on f.feedno = r.feedno left outer join userinfo u on f.userid = u.userid where f.feedno = #{feedNo}
